derivation: or (shortened) דְּבִר; from H1696 (דָבַר) (apparently in the sense of oracle);
outline:
1. the holy of holies, the innermost room of the temple or tabernacle
    1. hindmost chamber, innermost room of the temple of Solomon, most holy place, holy of holies
  2. (TWOT) oracle
strongs_def: the shrine or innermost part of the sanctuary
